title: Lubuntu 22.04 LTS Users Can Now Install the LXQt 1.4 Desktop, Here’s How
description:
Lubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) users can now install the latest LXQt 1.4 desktop environment from the Lubuntu Backports PPA. Here's how!

The post Lubuntu 22.04 LTS Users Can Now Install the LXQt 1.4 Desktop, Here’s How appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Fwupd 1.9.8 Brings Support for uSWID SBoM Data with LZMA Compressed Payloads
description:
Fwupd 1.9.8 Linux firmware updater is now available for download with support for uSWID SBoM data with LZMA compressed payloads, support for new devices, as well as many other changes.

The post Fwupd 1.9.8 Brings Support for uSWID SBoM Data with LZMA Compressed Payloads appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Blender 4.0 Released with Support for AMD RDNA2 and RDNA3 APUs, Node Tools
description:
Blender 4.0 open-source 3D computer graphics software is now available for download with numerous new features and improvements. Here's what's new!

The post Blender 4.0 Released with Support for AMD RDNA2 and RDNA3 APUs, Node Tools appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
